title: Princeton's Mody Says BOE Brexit Panic is Irresponsible (Audio)
itunes:title: Princeton's Mody Says BOE Brexit Panic is Irresponsible (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: FED IN FOCUS: Bloomberg View Contributor Ashoka Mody, Visiting Professor at the Woodrow Wilson School of Princeton and a former economist at the International Monetary Fund, weighs in on Brexit warnings and impact to the Fed.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
